articles.description: Jerry Douglas joined the cast of "The Young and The Restless" in 1982 as wealthy single father John Abbott. He died Tuesday at 88.
articles.content:
Jerry Douglas, who starred as patriarch John Abbott on "The Young and the Restless" for more than 30 years, died Tuesday after a brief illness. He was 88.

articles.author: Tommy Taylor
articles.title: Jay-Z wins cologne lawsuit after being sued by fragrance company for failing to promote his product - Daily Mail
articles.description: A New York jury cleared Jay-Z of a 2016 cologne lawsuit on Wednesday after fragrance company Parlux sought the singer for $68 million in damages claiming he failed to promote his product
articles.content: Hip-hop mogul Jay-Z will not have to dig into his piggybank to pay $68 million to a perfume company for failing to promote his signature fragrance, a Manhattan jury ruled Wednesday - bringing to an e… [+3634 chars]
